mapper.select: select * from tbl_book order by bno
select count(*) from tbl_book where bno > 0

select distinct bno, isbn, title, publisher, thumbnail, url, datetime from ( select rownum rn, bno, book.isbn, title, publisher, thumbnail, url, datetime from tbl_book book left outer join tbl_book_author author on book.bno = author.bno where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} order by bno desc

select count(distinct book.isbn) from tbl_book book left outer join tbl_book_author author on book.isbn = author.isbn where
bno > 0
select bno, isbn from tbl_book where isbn like #{isbn}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_book (bno, isbn, title, publisher, thumbnail, url, datetime, userid) values (seq_book.nextval, #{isbn}, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{thumbnail}, #{url}, #{datetime}, #{userId})
